summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，對內建或使用者定義的簡單型別驗證指定的 。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, validates the specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type.

returns.span: ，可安全地轉換為 屬性傳回的型別。

span.span: An that can be cast safely to the type returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會驗證`string`指定針對內建或使用者定義的簡單型別。The method validates the `string` specified against a built-in or user-defined simple type. 例如，如果這個代表類型 xs: date 則的執行個體會傳回。For example, if this represents the type xs:date, then an instance of is returned. 以下是執行期間執行的步驟方法的驗證程序。The following are the steps performed during the method's validation process. 1. 轉換為指定的值`string`至其對應 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型。Convert the value specified as a `string` to its corresponding Common Language Runtime (CLR) type. 2. 請確認此值不違反任何簡單型別定義的 facet。Verify that the value does not violate any facets defined for the simple type. 已轉換的值則會傳回做為並且可以安全地轉換成所傳回的類型屬性。The converted value is then returned as an and can be cast safely to the type returned by the property. 當物件都代表清單類型、 輸入`string`值會轉換成一或多個物件的清單。When the object represents a list type, the input `string` value is converted to a list of one or more objects. 當物件表示清單型別，則嘗試將輸入的值剖析為聯集成員類型。When the object represents a list type, an attempt is made to parse the input value as a member type of the union. 如果剖析嘗試失敗，則轉換會嘗試的聯集的下一個成員之前剖析成功，或沒有其他成員的型別來剖析。If the parse attempt fails, then the conversion is attempted with the next member of the union until the parse is successful or there are no other member types to parse. 如果剖析成功，則會擲回例外狀況。If the parse is unsuccessful, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取`LotteryNumber`簡單型別從 example.xsd 檔案，作為然後驗證`string`的值`5`使用方法。The following example retrieves the `LotteryNumber` simple type from the example.xsd file as an and then validates the `string` value of `5` using the method. [!code-cpp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/CPP/datatype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/CS/datatype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/VB/datatype.vb#1)] 下列 XML 檔案用於上述程式碼範例。The following XML file is used for the preceding code example. [!code-xml[Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic Webdata XmlSchemaDatatype Example/XML/example.xsd#2)]

exception.span: 輸入值不是這個 W3C XML 結構描述型別的有效執行個體。

span.span: The input value is not a valid instance of this W3C XML Schema type.
The value to parse cannot be .

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得如在全球資訊網協會 (W3C) XML 1.0 規格中所指定之 的型別。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the type for the as specified in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML 1.0 specification.
An value for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓`string`讀取做為特定 XML 類型，例如 CDATA 區段型別。Allows the `string` to be read as a particular XML type, for example, a CDATA section type. 下表顯示語彙基元的型別。The following table shows the token types. |XmlTokenizedTypeXmlTokenizedType|描述Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`CDATA`|CDATA 型別CDATA type| |`ID`|識別碼類型ID type| |`IDREF`|IDREF 型別IDREF type| |`IDREFS`|IDREFS 類型IDREFS type| |`ENTITY`|實體類型ENTITY type| |`ENTITIES`|實體類型ENTITIES type| |`NMTOKEN`|NMTOKEN 型別NMTOKEN type| |`NMTOKENS`|NMTOKENS 型別NMTOKENS type| |`NOTATION`|NOTATION 型別NOTATION type| |`ENUMERATION`|列舉型別ENUMERATION type| |`QName`|QName 類型QName type| |`NCName`|NCName 型別NCName type| |`None`|沒有型別No type|

summary.span: 取得簡單型別的 值。

span.span: Gets the value for the simple type.
The value for the simple type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks W3C XML 結構描述清單型別，例如 xs: entities、 xs: nmtokens 和 xs: idrefs 未表示的列舉型別。W3C XML Schema list types such as xs:ENTITIES, xs:NMTOKENS and xs:IDREFS are not represented by the enumeration. 相反地，這些會由xs:ENTITY、 xs 和 xs: idref 型別，具有值屬性物件設為。Instead they are represented by the values for the xs:ENTITY, xs:NMTOKEN and xs:IDREF types with the property of the object set to . > [!NOTE] > 將 xs:anySimpleType 與 xs: anytype 的型別不由列舉型別。Both the xs:anySimpleType and xs:anyType types are not represented by enumeration. 這些顯示在物件的值是xs:anySimpleType 的或為 xs: anytype。These are represented in an object with an whose value is for xs:anySimpleType or for xs:anyType. ## Examples 如需屬性，請參閱。For an example of the property, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得的 CLR 類型的項目。The property gets the CLR type of the item. 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`會有的預設。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 不過，可能是任何一個可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`，例如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱 < [System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md). ## Examples 如需屬性，請參閱。For an example of the property, see .
